resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106684</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106684</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207055</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">When Rice Was King</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Als Reis König War</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quand Le Riz Était Roi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quando O Arroz Era Rei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quando Il Riso Era Re</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όταν το ρύζι ήταν βασιλιάς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuando El Arroz Era Rey</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">concentrates on Georgetown County, South Carolina, where rice, rather than cotton, was the principal commercial product. The site contains maps, readings, photos, drawings, as well as a guide for doing a student project.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">auf Georgetown Grafschaft, Südcarolina, in der 
Reis sich konzentriert, anstatt war Baumwolle, das allgemeine 
Handelsprodukt. Die Site enthält Karten, Messwerte, Fotos, 
Zeichnungen, sowie eine Anleitung für das Tun eines 
Kursteilnehmerprojektes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">se concentre sur le comté de Georgetown, Caroline
Du sud, où riz, plutôt que le coton, était le produit 
commercial principal. Le site contient des cartes, lectures, 
photos, schémas, comme un guide pour faire un projet d'étudiant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">concentra no condado de Georgetown, carolina sul, 
onde arroz, melhor que o algodão, era o produto comercial principal. 
O local contem mapas, leituras, fotos, desenhos, assim como uma 
guia para fazer um projeto do estudante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">si concentra sulla contea de Georgetown, Carolina 
del Sud, in cui riso, piuttosto che il cotone, era il prodotto 
commerciale principale. Il luogo contiene i programmi, le 
letture, le foto, illustrazioni, come pure una guida per fare un 
progetto dell'allievo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επικεντρώνεται στο νομό της Τζωρτζτάουν, νότια 
Καρολίνα, όπου το ρύζι, παρά το βαμβάκι, ήταν το κύριο 
εμπορικό προϊόν. Η περιοχή περιέχει τους χάρτες, τις 
αναγνώσεις, τις φωτογραφίες, τα σχέδια, καθώς επίσης και έναν 
οδηγό για να κάνει ένα πρόγραμμα σπουδαστών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">se concentra en el condado de Georgetown, Carolina
del Sur, en donde arroz, más bien que el algodón, era el producto 
comercial principal. El sitio contiene las correspondencias, 
lecturas, fotos, gráficos, tan bien como una guía para hacer un 
proyecto del estudiante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207055</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106684</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/when-rice-was-king</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
